sprache.filesoutdated: You are running a version with outdated files.
sprache.ok: You are running the latest version.
sprache.outdated: You are running an outdated version:
sprache.prepare1: When running updates there is always a possibility that something can go wrong. Be prepared to avoid dataloss or a permenantly damaged database.
sprache.prepare2: To be prepared please safe all your data and make a backup of your database.
sprache.prepare3: Please only proceed after making your backup.
